Rayakan 8 Tahun Bermusik, Tulus Gelar Festival Sewindu
01 Nov 2019, 16:16 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Tulus merayakan perjalanan karier dengan menggelar Festival Sewindu pada Jumat (1/11) di Istora Senayan, Jakarta. (Foto: Tulus)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Solois Tulus punya cara berbeda untuk merayakan kariernya. Ia memilih mengadakan Festival Tulus di Istora Senayan, Jakarta pada Jumat (1/11), sebagai penutup rangkaian Tur dan Festival Sewindu yang dilaksanakan sejak 24 September di lima kota berbeda.Melalui festival ini, ia ingin menyampaikan apresiasi dan terima kasih kepada penggemar yang kerap disebut Teman Tulus.Sewindu, yang sejatinya adalah judul salah satu hit Tulus, dipilih karena lagu itu yang mengantarnya ke puncak popularitas. "Lagu Sewindu ini umurnya sudah mencapai delapan tahun, tapi sampai saat ini energinya tidak berkurang jika saya nyanyikan di atas panggung. Dulu ketika saya rilis lagu ini, tidak memiliki ekspektasi yang lebih seperti saat ini," kata Tulus beberapa waktu lalu.Sebagai puncak acara, Festival Sewindu malam ini dirancang sedemikian rupa. Tulus sendiri disebut terlibat secara langsung di sektor kreatif."Konsep di Jakarta nanti adalah festival. Tidak seperti Konser Monokrom yang kemarin, tapi ada beberapa panggung di sana [Istora Senayan] dan juga akan ada guest star yang akan berkolaborasi yang masih kami rahasiakan," kata Tulus lagi pada September lalu.


Pada 2019, Tulus hadir dalam lagu 'Adu Rayu' bersama Yovie Widianto dan Glenn Fredly. (screenshot via Youtube/@Yovie Widianto)

Konsep misterius itu benar-benar diterapkan oleh Tulus. Dari akun Instagram, ia mengunggah video pendek yang menampilkan setidaknya enam mozaik. Mozaik-mozaik tersebut seolah menjadi petunjuk penyanyi dan musisi yang akan mengisi Festival Sewindu.



Tulus merilis album debut bertajuk penamaan diri sendiri pada 2011. Memiliki Diorama sampai Tuan Nona Kesepian, album itu segera mendapat tempat di hati penggemar. Album kedua, Gajah, telah begitu diantisipasi.Tak butuh waktu lama, Tulus diperhitungkan sebagai salah satu solois pria Indonesia berbakat. Pada 2016, ia kemudian merilis Monokrom. Kariernya berjalan mulus, seiring dengan tiket-tiket konser yang terjual habis dan gelaran tur di kota-kota Indonesia.Festival Sewindu Tulus dijadwalkan mulai pada pukul 16.25 WIB. Hingga saat ini pun nama para kolaborator konser ini tidak diumumkan. (rea)

Celebrate 8 Years of Music, Tulus Holds the Sewindu Festival
01 Nov 2019, 16:16 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Tulus celebrated his career by holding the Sewindu Festival on Friday (1/11) at Istora Senayan, Jakarta. (Photo: sincere)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Soloist Tulus has a different way to celebrate his career. He chose to hold the Tulus Festival at Istora Senayan, Jakarta on Friday (1/11), as the closing of the Sewindu Tour and Festival series held on September 24 in five different cities. Through this festival, he would like to express his appreciation and thanks to fans who often called Teman Tulus. Seindu, which is actually the title of one of Tulus's hits, was chosen because the song brought him to the peak of popularity. "This song Sewindu has reached the age of eight years, but until now its energy has not diminished if I sing on the stage. In the past when I released this song, I had no expectations that were more like now," said Tulus some time ago. The Sewindu Festival tonight is designed in such a way. Tulus himself is said to be directly involved in the creative sector. "The concept in Jakarta will be a festival. Unlike the Monochrome Concert yesterday, but there are several stages there [Istora Senayan] and there will also be guest stars who will collaborate which we are still keeping a secret," Tulus said again last September.


In 2019, Tulus was present in the song 'Adu Rayu' with Yovie Widianto and Glenn Fredly. (screenshot via Youtube / @ Yovie Widianto)

This mysterious concept was truly applied by Tulus. From his Instagram account, he uploaded a short video featuring at least six mosaics. The mosaics seemed to be a guide for the singers and musicians who would fill the Sewindu Festival.



Tulus released his debut album titled self-naming in 2011. Having a diorama until Mr. Miss Lonely, the album soon gained a place in the hearts of fans. The second album, Gajah, has been so anticipated. It did not take long, Tulus was considered one of the talented soloists of Indonesian men. In 2016, he later released Monochrome. His career ran smoothly, along with concert tickets that were sold out and tour events in Indonesian cities. The Sewindu Tulus Festival is scheduled to start at 16:25 WIB. Until now the names of the concert collaborators were not announced. (rea)
